name: Barbell Bench Press
description: Lie on a flat bench and press a barbell upward from chest level.

name: Squat
description: Lower your body by bending your knees while keeping your back straight.

name: Pull-up
description: Hang from a bar and pull your body up until chin is over the bar.

name: Yoga Stretch
description: Stretching routine to improve flexibility and balance.
